meanings.definition: A thick spread made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic.
meanings.sent1: I spread humous on my sandwich for a tasty lunch.
meanings.sent2: The humous at the party was a hit with everyone.
meanings.sent3: The humous decided to throw a party for all the other spreads.
meanings.sent4: The humous was a smooth and creamy delight on the taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The humous was so flavorful, it danced on my tongue.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of humus.
meanings.sent1: The garden had a rich and humous soil that was perfect for growing plants.
meanings.sent2: The humous aroma of the forest filled the air after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The humous earth seemed to whisper secrets to the plants growing in it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a humous sponge, absorbing knowledge effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The humous ground cradled the seeds, nurturing them into strong plants.
